choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
### Assistant:

Here's a sample 7-day meal plan that meets your dietary restrictions:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and chia seeds (dairy-free)
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette (no garlic or honey in the dressing)
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (no almonds, pistachios, or cashews)
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter (use a dairy-free nut butter instead of almond butter)

Day 2:
Breakfast: Overnight oats with almond milk and chia seeds (dairy-free)
Lunch: Grilled vegetable wrap with hummus (no garlic or honey in the hummus)
Dinner: Lentil soup with whole grain bread (no almonds, pistachios, or cashews)
Snack: Carrot sticks with guacamole (use a dairy-free nut butter instead of almond butter)

Day 3:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes (no garlic or honey in the dish)
Lunch: Turkey and cheese sandwich on whole grain bread (use a dairy-free cheese alternative instead of regular cheese)
Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with mixed greens salad (no almonds, pistachios, or cashews)
Snack: Rice cakes with avocado and salsa (use a dairy-free nut butter instead of almond butter)

Day 4:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with banana, strawberries, and coconut milk (dairy-free)
Lunch: Grilled chicken Caesar salad with croutons made from whole grain bread (use a dairy-free cheese alternative instead of regular cheese)
Dinner: Baked tofu with roasted vegetables (no almonds, pistachios, or cashews)
Snack: Apple slices with peanut butter (use a dairy-free nut butter instead of almond butter)

Day 5:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and chia seeds (dairy-free)
Lunch: Grilled vegetable wrap with hummus (no garlic or honey in the hummus)
Dinner: Lentil soup with whole grain bread (no almonds, pistachios, or cashews)
Snack: Carrot sticks with guacamole (use a dairy-free nut butter instead of almond butter)

Day 6:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes (no garlic or honey in the dish)
Lunch: Turkey and cheese sandwich on whole grain bread (use a dairy-free cheese alternative instead of regular cheese)
Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with mixed greens salad (no almonds, pistachios, or cashews)
Snack: Rice cakes with avocado and salsa (use a dairy-free nut butter instead of almond butter)

Day 7:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with banana, strawberries, and coconut milk (dairy-free)
Lunch: Grilled chicken Caesar salad with croutons made from whole grain bread (use a dairy-free cheese alternative instead of regular cheese)
Dinner: Baked tofu with roasted vegetables (no almonds, pistachios, or cashews)
Snack: Apple slices with peanut butter (use a dairy-free nut butter instead of almond butter)

Remember to adjust portion sizes and calorie intake based on your individual needs.
